attractions.name: Red Fort (Lal Qila)
attractions.description: UNESCO World Heritage Site - Mughal emperor's residence and symbol of India's independence. Built by Shah Jahan in 1648, this massive red sandstone fort served as the main residence of Mughal emperors for nearly 200 years.

location.address: Netaji Subhash Marg, Lal Qila, Chandni Chowk, New Delhi, Delhi 110006

bestOption.reason: Best balance of cost, time, and convenience

attractions.name: India Gate
attractions.description: Iconic war memorial arch dedicated to Indian soldiers who died in World War I. Built in 1931, it's a symbol of national pride and a popular gathering spot.

location.address: Rajpath, India Gate, New Delhi, Delhi 110003

attractions.name: Qutub Minar
attractions.description: UNESCO World Heritage Site - Tallest brick minaret in the world at 73 meters. Built in 1193, it's a masterpiece of Indo-Islamic architecture.

attractions.name: Gateway of India
attractions.description: Iconic arch monument built in 1924 to commemorate the visit of King George V and Queen Mary. It's Mumbai's most recognizable landmark.

attractions.name: Elephanta Caves
attractions.description: UNESCO World Heritage Site - Ancient rock-cut caves dedicated to Lord Shiva. Dating back to 5th-8th century, featuring magnificent sculptures and carvings.

bestOption.reason: Only way to reach the island

attractions.name: Lalbagh Botanical Garden
attractions.description: Famous botanical garden established in 1760, home to over 1,000 species of plants. Features a glass house, lake, and beautiful flower shows.

attractions.name: MTR Restaurant
attractions.description: Legendary South Indian restaurant established in 1924, famous for authentic dosas, idlis, and traditional Karnataka cuisine.

location.address: Lalbagh Road, Near Lalbagh Main Gate, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560004

attractions.name: Marina Beach
attractions.description: Second longest urban beach in the world, stretching 13 km along the Bay of Bengal. Popular for sunrise, sunset, and beach activities.

attractions.name: Victoria Memorial
attractions.description: Magnificent marble building built in 1921 in memory of Queen Victoria. Houses a museum with artifacts from British colonial period.

location.address: Victoria Memorial Hall, 1, Queens Way, Maidan, Kolkata, West Bengal 700071

attractions.name: Charminar
attractions.description: Iconic monument built in 1591 by Muhammad Quli Qutb Shah. Four grand arches facing four directions, symbol of Hyderabad's heritage.

attractions.name: Golconda Fort
attractions.description: Massive fortress built in the 13th century, famous for its acoustic system and diamond mines. Offers panoramic views of Hyderabad.

attractions.name: Sri Venkateswara Temple (Tirumala)
attractions.description: One of the most visited religious sites in the world, dedicated to Lord Venkateswara. Located on Tirumala hills, attracting millions of devotees annually.

attractions.name: Sri Padmavathi Ammavari Temple
attractions.description: Ancient temple dedicated to Goddess Padmavathi, consort of Lord Venkateswara. Located in Tiruchanur, known for its beautiful architecture.

attractions.name: Kapila Theertham (Kapileswara Temple)
attractions.description: Temple at the base of Tirumala hills with a scenic waterfall. Dedicated to Lord Shiva, known for its natural beauty and spiritual significance.

attractions.name: Talakona Waterfalls
attractions.description: Highest waterfall in Andhra Pradesh at 270 feet. Surrounded by dense forests, perfect for nature lovers and adventure enthusiasts.

location.address: Talakona, Sri Venkateswara National Park, Andhra Pradesh 517503

attractions.name: Chandragiri Fort
attractions.description: Historic fort built in the 11th century, later used by Vijayanagara kings. Offers panoramic views and houses a museum with ancient artifacts.

attractions.name: Karim's Restaurant
attractions.description: Historic restaurant established in 1913, famous for authentic Mughlai cuisine. Known for its kebabs, biryanis, and traditional Indian dishes.

location.address: 16, Gali Kababian, Jama Masjid, New Delhi, Delhi 110006

attractions.name: Leopold Cafe
attractions.description: Historic cafe established in 1871, famous for its colonial charm and delicious food. Popular among tourists and locals alike.

location.address: SBS Road, Colaba Causeway, Mumbai, Maharashtra 400005

attractions.name: Chandni Chowk
attractions.description: Historic market established in 1650, famous for spices, jewelry, textiles, and street food. One of the oldest and busiest markets in Delhi.

attractions.name: Commercial Street
attractions.description: Famous shopping street in Bangalore, known for traditional and modern items. Popular for clothing, accessories, and street food.

attractions.name: Select Citywalk Mall
attractions.description: Premium shopping mall in Saket with international brands, restaurants, and entertainment. Features luxury retail stores, food courts, and multiplex cinema.

location.address: A-3, District Centre, Saket, New Delhi, Delhi 110017

attractions.name: Phoenix Mills
attractions.description: One of Mumbai's largest shopping malls with luxury brands, entertainment zones, and fine dining restaurants.

location.address: 462, Senapati Bapat Marg, Lower Parel, Mumbai, Maharashtra 400013

attractions.name: Orion Mall
attractions.description: Modern shopping mall in Bangalore with international brands, entertainment, and dining options.

location.address: Brigade Gateway, Dr Rajkumar Road, Malleshwaram, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560055

attractions.name: Paranthe Wali Gali
attractions.description: Famous street food lane in Old Delhi known for delicious parathas. Traditional North Indian breakfast spot with authentic flavors.

location.address: Paranthe Wali Gali, Chandni Chowk, New Delhi, Delhi 110006

attractions.name: Bademiya Restaurant
attractions.description: Iconic late-night street food joint famous for kebabs and rolls. Popular among locals and tourists for authentic Mumbai street food.

location.address: Tulloch Road, Apollo Bunder, Colaba, Mumbai, Maharashtra 400001

attractions.name: Vidyarthi Bhavan
attractions.description: Legendary South Indian restaurant established in 1943, famous for crispy dosas and authentic Karnataka cuisine.

location.address: 32, Gandhi Bazaar Main Road, Basavanagudi, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560004

attractions.name: Baga Beach
attractions.description: Popular beach destination in Goa known for water sports, nightlife, and beach shacks. Perfect for swimming, sunbathing, and beach parties.

attractions.name: City Palace, Jaipur
attractions.description: Magnificent palace complex in the heart of Jaipur, showcasing Rajput and Mughal architecture. Houses museums with royal artifacts and textiles.

location.address: Tulsi Marg, Gangori Bazaar, J.D.A. Market, Pink City, Jaipur, Rajasthan 302002

attractions.name: Kerala Backwaters
attractions.description: Serene network of lagoons, lakes, and canals in Kerala. Famous for houseboat cruises through picturesque landscapes and coconut groves.

attractions.name: Meenakshi Amman Temple
attractions.description: Ancient Hindu temple dedicated to Goddess Meenakshi and Lord Sundareswarar. Famous for its magnificent architecture and colorful gopurams.
